articles.description: Briton Mark Cavendish claims the outright Tour de France stage win record by taking his 35th victory to surpass Eddy Merckx on stage five in Saint Vulbas.
articles.title: Tour de France: Mark Cavendish claims record-breaking 35th stage win

articles.description: John White did the League and Cup Double and won the Cup Winners Cup winner, but his sudden death left his son searching for the man beneath the comic-book persona
articles.title: Tottenham's John White and his son's search for lost superstar

articles.description: Lauren Bell takes a career-best 5-37 as England seal a 3-0 series win over New Zealand at Bristol.
articles.title: England vs New Zealand: Lauren Bell takes five wickets as hosts secure series clean sweep

articles.description: The USA men's team is reviewing the home Copa America exit, with several big name managers linked with the job.
articles.title: Could USA get Guardiola or Klopp as manager before 2026 World Cup?

articles.description: England forward Phil Foden says the team's players "need to take some of the blame"  for poor performances and that he "feels sorry" for under pressure manager Gareth Southgate.
articles.title: Phil Foden says players 'need to take some blame' and he 'feels sorry' for England boss Gareth Southgate

articles.description: Andy Murray begins his Wimbledon farewell on Thursday as he teams up with brother Jamie in the men's doubles, while there are two all-British battles in the singles.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Andy Murray starts SW19 farewell as Jack Draper plays Cameron Norrie and Katie Boulter faces Harriet Dart

articles.description: Emma Raducanu cruises past Belgium’s Elise Mertens to join fellow Briton Sonay Kartal in the Wimbledon third round.
articles.title: Wimbeldon 2024: Emma Raducanu wins as Sonay Kartal secures third-round meeting with Coco Gauff

articles.description: BBC Sport assesses the Copa America knockout stages before the quarter-finals get under way on Friday.
articles.title: Copa America 2024: Quarter-finals guide - Nunez, Messi, Diaz, David

articles.description: Naomi Osaka pays the price for too many errors as she loses in straight sets to Emma Navarro.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Naomi Osaka beaten by Emma Navarro as Coco Gauff wins

articles.description: BBC Sport columnist Nedum Onuoha explains why Euro 2024 is not bringing out the best versions of the top teams and star players.
articles.title: Euro 2024: BBC Sport's Nedum Onuoha on why he thinks the big teams and star players are not at their best
